33542702.review: This game is known as being another one of those "joke" games that you see YouTubers playing just for laughs (and there is some entertainment in that regard when you show it to friends and family) but this also really is a fun and challenging game. I think the $6 price tag is reasonable in and of itself, but if it's on sale for a dollar and some pocket change again, I'd highly recommend buying this game if you're into platforms. On a side note, I found the levels to be designed more like a Mario Maker level than and actual Mario game. I understand that yes, the game is designed so that everything seems good is bad and everything that seems bad is good, but I guess what I'm saying is that the level design lacks a certain "polish" that I can't quite explain in words. It's still a fun game nonetheless!

25058712.review:
Мені, як людині, яка виховувалася у кращих традиціях платформера Супер Маріо так і не вдалося повністю перевчитися, що монетки погані. І цим гра підкуповує. Це класичний платформер, проте в ньому все на перший погляд добре є насправді поганим. А погане - добрим. Платформер-антонім. І до того доволі складний. Помирати деведеться часто.

Під час цієї гри часто з’являтимуться думки: "Довбана фея" чи "Клята принцеса". Монетки вбивають, феї вбивають, квіточки вбивають, усміхнені серця вбивають, а принцеса взагалі викрала нашого друга. Такі справи, що гра навіть має сюжет і досить кумедний, хоча дуже короткий.

Та й рівнів лише близько 20, також є декілька бонусних-додаткових. Проте багато з них дуже складні і кожен рівень може стати серйозною перешкодою.

Серед недоліків відсутність української локалізації, неможливо вимкнути повністю звук в грі. Не можна також змінити керування. Та й рівнів всього 20, кожен з яких за "чистого" виконання на 2-3 хвилини, не більше.

Висновок: кумедний, незвичний платформер.

19926680.review:
Who is Dan? I don't know. I do know I like him.
Dan lives in a very different world than ours.
His world is, well, opposite of what you think.
Things you would do normally in these kind of games you do the opposite here.
Falling through the floor...safe
Jumping on spikes...safe
Lighting yourself on fire...was never safe anyway
Collecting coins...unsafe
Collecting hearts...unsafe. I think you get the picture now.

All in all, this game is fun but will make you rage quit alot. I just did right before I wrote this review.
Good graphics. Good playability. Good sound effects and good music that fits the gameplay.
Give Dan a try. He's anything but 'default'. lol

17417396.review:
This is a surprisingly fun platformer. The thing that distinguishes this game from everything else on the market is that it makes you relearn everything you know about video games. Collectables that you are used to getting such as coins will be met with fatal results in Default Dan, and traditional obstacles such as spikes and bottomless pits must be used in order to pass the level. 

This simple yet clever twist makes Default Dan a completely memorable game. I would say $6 is a fair price for what you get, but Default Dan is a game that should not be passed up on sale!

16922400.review:
막장마리오 스타일의 어렵고 불공평한 플랫포머인데 못 깨서 집어던질 정도는 아니고 
저같은 발컨도 1회차 정도는 깰수 있는 정도의 난이도 입니다
주인공 생김새도 그렇고 제목인 Default Dan도 Super Mario 를 비튼 것인데 거의 슈퍼마리오 패러디 게임이라고 볼 수 있습니다
게임에 나오는 모든 요소가 슈퍼마리오의 반대로 나와서 재밌습니다 
스토리마저도 쿠파가 납치되고 공주가 악역으로 나올 정도입니다
척 보기에 프리렌더링된 3d그래픽이 굉장히 싸구려처럼 보이지만 음악도 좋고 잘 만들어진 게임입니다

15248310.review:
Becoming jealous of Dan's bromance with his best friend [strike]Bowser[/strike] Dino, the evil princess turns to dinonapping in a desperate bid to get Dan outside and away from his man cave. After a lifetime of rescuing princesses, collecting coins, avoiding spikes and watching out for pitfalls, it's time to do the complete opposite. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s1_nl2GYgSg
Playing  through 20+ levels over 4 distinct worlds, you will slowly retrain your brain in the ways of the platformer. Starting with ignoring all road signs since they usually point straight toward death. Each level has hidden collectables which after further progress gives you the ability to unlock [strike]toadstools[/strike] sidequests. Timed leaderboards were also available for speedrunners. Would suggesting using a gamepad but controls were manageable with a kb+mouse.

Outside of the constant tongue in cheek humour the visuals are where the game really stands out. Rendered beautifully in 2.5D and standing somewhere between old classics like Super Mario World and the modern era of platformers. Couple that with a wonderful soundtrack by [i]brentalfloss[/i] of DKC, SMW, Megaman (and more!) fame, which only added to the nostalgia. 

While 20 levels may not seem like a lot of content, Default Dan will make you rage and keep coming back just to perfect runs. For it's decent price point and the bizarrely backwards trip down memory lane it gets my recommendation. Cheers. :)

15189976.review:
[h1] Zapomnij wszystko czego sie już nauczyłeś [/h1]


Default Dan to gra całkowicie na opak, zrozumiecie to kiedy wam napisze że kolce są tutaj trampolinom, a monety i ciatka naszym najwiekszym wrogiem.
W odróżnieniu od ciotowatego mariu który wskakiwał na winde tutaj Dan wskakuje w przepaśc żeby dostąc sie dalej.
W przeciwieństwie od ciotowatego mario który skakał po wrogach odbierając im życie Dan zaczyna ich ujeżdzać.

Cóż więcej tu pisać, jest to bardzo przyjemna wariacja paltformówek, odbiega bardzo daleko od tego co znamy i jest piekielnie trudna. Więc nie polecałbym jej frustratom. Ilośc osiągnieć i poziom ich trudnosci jest ekstremalny więc nic tylko życzyć powodzenia achivmenthunterom.

14981416.review:
Very fun, but frustrating game. 
Default Dan really makes you focus on the exact opposite of what all of us know about video games and have known for a very long time. The fact that I kept messing up and hitting coins over and over again is an example of just how much this thing messes with your mind. 
Again, great game! But just keep in mind - EVERYTHING YOU KNOW IS WRONG!
